author: The Associated Press
title: What you need to know today about the virus outbreak
description: As President Donald Trump aims for a swift nationwide reopening, he faces a new challenge: convincing people it’s safe to come out and resume their normal lives
content: The coronavirus has taken a heavy toll on Veterans Affairs health care workers. White House officials believe they've entered a new chapter of the pandemic response. Meanwhile, another 4.4 million laid-off workers filed for unemployment. Plus, meet the nurse … [+3404 chars]
